name: Dead Target Effect: Shooting Z
description:
This is can be your last day on earth. Stay alive and survive as long as you can in this post apocalypse world and shoot walking dead zombies and bosses. First you’ll need to find weapons than kill zombies in this battlefield. You can trust only yourself in this post apocalyptic game infected with walking dead zombies. Now listen survivors. Your survival adventure is about to begin.

Features
1. Intriguing graphics of the Zombie killing game with relavant animations of the dead zombie.
2. Outstanding Intuitive controls
3. Relevant Sounds
4. Perfect Environment
5. Intense competitive Levels.
